document_data.name: Silpara Tesper
document_data.mainbody: '''Silpara Tesper''' was a [[wizard]] and noblewoman of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Tesper]].
document_data.Activities: She lived within [[Tespergates]] located at the corner of [[Mendever Street]] and [[Delzorin Street]] in the central section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.History:
Silpara was slain by [[assassin]]s sent by a younger brother who believed she would use her skills with [[magic]] to claim power within the family. Her [[ghost]] remained within Tespergates, quietly haunting the family villa.

Silpara once appeared directly next to a [[Harper]] named [[Nleera Tarannath Tesper|Nleera]] who was impersonating her ghost during a party at Tespergates, foiling the Harper's disguise and leading to her discovery by [[Armult Tesper]] who later married the Harper.
